name: Block Frenzy
overview: Another of T.M.R's early Backward Engineering releases, Block Frenzy is in fact a C64 remake of a popular (at the time) casual flash game. The goal is simple; move around the play area avoiding collisions with other blocks for as long as possible. Instantly playable and featuring frenetic game-play, it's all about the high score. How long can you survive the Frenzy?
